plot outline: Johnny is back in Rainbow Colony. This time, he has new friends and a new love interest. Priya, who he is in love with thanks to his fairy godmother, has her eyes set on a career and life in the United States. Will he be able to win her over?
title: Johnny Johnny Yes Papa
plot: Johnny and his father run a website but his work gets affected when Priya enters his life and creates a difficult situation for him.

Johnny is back in Rainbow Colony. This time, he has new friends and a new love interest. Priya, who he is in love with thanks to his fairy godmother, has her eyes set on a career and life in the United States. Will he be able to win her over?::Sunayana Suresh
